c2.title: Full Stack Developer · Freelancer
c2.description: Full-stack development of web applications using modern technologies such as MongoDB, Express, React, Node, and TypeScript. Development of APIs and interfaces with a focus on user experience enhancement. Implementation of robust programming practices, including version control with Git. Active participation in all stages of application development cycle, from planning to launch.

c3.title: Front-end Developer · Loja TrapStar
c3.description: Developed, maintained, and deployed production code for client websites, primarily utilizing HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Collaborated  with the design team to promote a cohesive team environment and ensure consistent user experiences. Performed quality tests to ensure cross browser compatibility, speed and responsiveness.
